content.heroIntro: Welcome to TAURUS, an exclusive residential development by BLUE MED INVEST located in the vibrant Puerto de Mazarron area of Murcia. This premium collection of 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas offers the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern comfort, with prices starting from just €294,000. Each villa spans 101m² of meticulously designed living space set on generous 126m² plots, providing the ideal foundation for your Spanish dream home. Delivered on 01-01-2027, TAURUS represents an exceptional opportunity for international buyers seeking quality construction, excellent value, and access to one of Spain's most sought-after coastal regions. With multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses nearby, and a thriving expatriate community, TAURUS offers far more than just a property—it offers a complete lifestyle transformation. BLUE MED INVEST brings decades of development expertise to this project, ensuring superior build quality, modern amenities, and outstanding investment potential with property values appreciating at +8% year-on-year.

locationSection.intro: Puerto de Mazarron is a charming coastal destination in the Mar de Plata region of Murcia, perfectly positioned between the vibrant energy of Cartagena and the serene beaches of the Mediterranean. This established area offers the ideal balance of authentic Spanish culture and modern international amenities, making it increasingly popular with European buyers and expatriates. The region boasts a Mediterranean climate with over 320 days of sunshine annually, stunning natural beaches awarded Blue Flag status, and a well-developed infrastructure supporting both residents and visitors. Puerto de Mazarron has evolved into a cosmopolitan hub where English is widely spoken, international schools operate, and a diverse community of foreigners has established strong roots. The combination of affordability—40% less than Spanish island markets—excellent healthcare facilities including regional hospitals with English-speaking doctors, and proximity to championship golf courses makes this location exceptionally attractive for investment and lifestyle purposes.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-EU and EU citizens can purchase property in Spain. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and can typically arrange financing through Spanish banks. BLUE MED INVEST assists with the buying process and can connect you with English-speaking legal professionals.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect: Transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), Notary fees (0.5-1%), Property registration fees (0.1%), Legal fees (1-2%). In Murcia, approximately 8-10% total additional costs. BLUE MED INVEST can provide detailed cost breakdowns for your specific situation.

faqs.question: What is the rental income potential for TAURUS villas?
faqs.answer: Average 7-night tourist rental rates in Puerto de Mazarron are €800, translating to approximately €41,600 annually. Many owners achieve higher rates during peak summer months. Professional management companies are available locally to handle bookings and maintenance.
